channel.title: Webclient
channel.description:
I jarred the client. If players open the jar they can play my server.
So I tried to place the jar on my webclient..
It only gives a white screen :(
so the webclient doesn't work, only the .jar
this is my html :
[code]<applet code="client.class" archive="demorpg.jar" width="765px" height="503px" title="Java">
<param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx512m">
<param name="server_name" value="Eredox">
<param name="detail" value="low">
<param name="ip" value="eredoxx.no-ip.org">
<param name="port" value="43594">
<param name="background_image" value="http://blog.newsok.com/ofinterest/files/2008/12/mask_pic.jpg">
<param name="headicons" value="">
</applet>[/code]

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

[code]

identityscape <applet code="client.class" archive="http://dl..com/u/35830723/soulscape.jar" width="765" height="503"

ANY MESSAGE ANOTHER MESSAGE

SERVER DOWN ATM -- NEW SERVER ! CLICK

HERE TO DOWNLOAD OUR NEW CACHE !

,

<a href=“http://www.hosting24.com/”><img src=“http://analytics.hosting24.com/count.php” alt=“web hosting” /></a>

[/code]

still gives a white screen

but thanks for trying to help bro

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

Here is my and a correct html
upload you’re client.jar to you’re public folder of dropbox
Then copy the public link.
And place it where it says You’re link

[code]

identityscape <applet code="client.class" archive="YOURE DROPBOX CLIENT.JAR LINK!" width="765" height="503"

ANY MESSAGE ANOTHER MESSAGE [/code]

Read full topic
